MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG12 postcode area of Annan. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.21am due to broken overhead line equipment at Milnfield and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulties on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.43am on 26th October 2020.
